mapper.update: update student set telephone=#{telephone},time=#{time} where stu_id=#{id}
update student set password=#{password} where stu_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(stu.stu_id) from student stu left join college c on stu.college_id = c.id left join college s on s.id=stu.subject_id and s.college_id=c.id left join stu_bed sb on stu.stu_id = sb.stu_id left join hostel h on h.hostel_id=sb.hostel_id

select stu.stu_id id,stu.stu_name name,stu.sex sex,stu.college_id collegeId,c.name collegeName,stu.subject_id subjectId ,s.name subjectName,stu.age age,stu.telephone telephone,sb.bedroom_id bedroomId,h.hostel_id hostelId,h.name hostelName ,stu.time time from student stu left join college c on stu.college_id = c.id left join college s on s.id=stu.subject_id and s.college_id=c.id left join stu_bed sb on stu.stu_id = sb.stu_id left join hostel h on h.hostel_id=sb.hostel_id
limit #{offset},#{pageNumber}
